title: Bug 116786: Library include does not store relative path
description: When including a library in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path. Currently, it is not saving the relative path correctly.
OB: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer does not generate or save the relative path correctly.
EB: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should automatically generate and save the relative path.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open a report design in the BIRT designer.
2. Include a library from a different location.
3. Verify that the BIRT designer does not generate or save the relative path correctly.
